about_the_game:
Race On Ice 2022 Pro is an ice racing game where you can drive 29 drivers of the year 2021-2022 of the category Pro and Lite . The goal is very simple, you take a driver and try to win the race.

New :

- New electric car for Silvin Compétition's team
- A grid of 5-6 to 6-7 cars
- R.O.I Lite is back
- Update of circuits with some new and the correct of trucks's size and pit sign

Feature :

3 Modes : Time Attack , Race and Season

Time Attack :

Train on one of the 6 circuits for improve yourself .

Race :

There are 28 pilots who are divided in 6 teams. So choose a driver and try to lead him to victory.

Season :

- Season 2021-2022 of R.O.I Pro

15 drivers 6 teams and 6 tracks

Race with 6-7 cars Season 5 races

- Season 2021-2022 of R.O.I Lite

14 drivers 6 teams and 6 tracks

Race with 6-7 cars Season 5 races



Only keyboards and mouse

This game includes :

- Fake names - Fake tracks - Fake teams - Fake cars

No licence

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel Core I3 7020U CPU 2.30 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 620
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Intel® Display Audio , Realtek High Definition Audio
  • Additional Notes: Only Keyboard and Mouse

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS
  • Processor: Intel Core I3 7020U CPU 2.30 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 620
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Intel® Display Audio , Realtek High Definition Audio
  • Additional Notes: Only Keyboard and Mouse

name: Race On Ice 2022 Pro
